content: the thea off the shoulder crop top is a chic stylish summer crop top that is perfect for warm weather created from the neck down in a cotton yarn this airy breezy top is a wonderful addition to any summer wardrobe skill level easy sizes xs/s m l xl 2xl 3xl materials yarn lion brand 24/7 cotton 4mm us g crochet hook scissors darning needle stitch markers this pattern is written in english using us crochet terms this pattern is also accompanied by a youtube video tutorial check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4 check out the pattern for free on my blog
